name: UPCRAWL
description:
Keep working your way up as long as you can!

/** INSTRUCTIONS **/

[Press] X - Attack, Interact

[Hold] X - Charge

[Release] X - Release Charge

[Press] Z - Use Item

[Press] ENTER - Start Menu. You can change the music playing!

/*************************/

@MatheusMortatti - Programming, Art and Level Design

@SimonHutchinson - Menu and Gameplay Themes

@ScowshMolosh - Gameplay Theme

This game was a submission for the lowrez jam. Keep in mind that the browser version is POST JAM. Download the files to play the original jam version.
